definition[0]: the activity of managing salary payments for workers in a company
definition[1]: the total amount of wages paid to all the people working in a particular company or industry
example[3]: The company has cut its total payroll by 7% since the merger.
example[4]: More than half the state budget goes to payroll and only 11% to public works.
definition[2]: the activity of managing wage and SALARY payments for employees
example[5]: The Human Resources Department is responsible for payroll administration.
definition[3]: to be employed by a particular company
example[6]: Under the plan, every employee on the payroll can buy 100 shares at $127.25 each.
